imgDesc.text: In Sumeru, special creatures exist that can transform due to stimuli from external elemental energy. These are referred to as "Tri-Lakshana Creatures."

When they come into contact with <color=#ffe14b>Electro or Pyro</color> , they will enter either an Activated or a Scorched state.
Use the objects and the unique abilities of their various forms to aid in your adventure.
